27.title: My Heavenly Hockey Club
27.author: Ai Morinaga ; translated and adapted by Athena and Alethea Nibley ; lettered by North Market Street Graphics.
notes: Summary (from OCLC): Hana Suzuki prefers to eat or sleep over anything else, but allows classmate Izumi Oda to persuade her to join the school field hockey club with the promise of delicious food and fine linens at the resorts they stay at. Of course there's also getting up early, working hard, and working as a team.

49.heading: My Journey.
49.title: Anno's Journey
49.author: Mitsumasa Anno.
notes: Published in 1977 under title: My journey, which is a translation of Tabi no ehon.

50.heading: My Journey II.

notes: Japanese edition entitled My journey II, which is a translation of Tabi no ehon, II.
